category: Sports Instructor Qualification Committee Regulations/Article 5 (Appointment of Committee Members)
contents: Article 5 (Appointment of Committee Members) ① The President of the Korea Sports Council (hereinafter referred to as *Chairman) appoints as members people with extensive knowledge and experience in sports, or people deemed suitable by the Chairman as members. ② The chairman becomes the chairman, and the vice-chairman is elected from among the members. ③ In order to minimize the possibility of unfair intervention by interested parties in the deliberation and resolution process of the committee by diagnosing the work ethics of the appointed member in advance, the appointed member must prepare and submit Form No. 1 and Form No. 2. do.
